title: The Wise Little Donkey
description: Cadichon is not an ordinary donkey, he is neither "as stupid as a donkey" nor "as obstinate as a donkey". He is a performing donkey (this is the title he uses to sign the story of his life) whose tricks are not always very kind; for not only is Cadichon a performing donkey, but also a revengeful one.
